image_prompt: A photo-realistic, cinematic wide shot inside a modern manufacturing facility. The engineer is holding a generic industrial tablet (back of device visible only) as if checking data. In the background, blurred slightly to create depth, are automated conveyor belts and robotic arms in motion.
